name: aleks-bar/vite-handlebars-postcss
description: Vite and Handlebars assembly for build to html pages with css and js files for each

post-create-project-cmd: php -r "if (is_dir('vendor')) { echo 'Removing vendor directory...'; deleteDirectory('vendor'); } function deleteDirectory($dir) { if (!is_dir($dir)) return; $items = scandir($dir); foreach ($items as $item) { if ($item === '.' || $item === '..') continue; $path = $dir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $item; if (is_dir($path)) deleteDirectory($path); else unlink($path); } rmdir($dir); }"
